storyInfo: Intending to avoid drawing attention, Reed prepares to leave the Taran refugees being pursued by the patrol. Meanwhile, on the trail of Dublinn's course, Bagpipe and Ch'en encounter some unusual Dublinn soldiers.

attributes.content: Leave your account book alone already. What, gonna wait a few days, and then go selling stuff out of your boot again?
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: No, that's never happening. *sigh*
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: But just, whenever I do something shameful, I feel the need to make a note.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: The doctor's a smart sortâ€”she knew how you'd gotten hurt on first blush, even. If she's not blaming you, that's because she forgives you.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: But she said, she wasn't a doctor. She just learned a little first-aid working someplace where they sell medicine. That's how she led us through treating our wounds...
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: How do you know she's telling the truth?
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: If you ask me? She's not your normal doctor, no, but there's no chance she's just some pharmacy worker. She had a full suite of medicine with her, out here in the wastes. That, that's strange.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, and did you see what she had in that box of hers? You're a business type. Got a guess on how much it was worth?
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: I didn't look properly.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: You can't be thinking of stealing luggage from the person who saved us.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: No, no, I'm just asking.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: *sigh*... Got any more bread there?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Not much.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Give me a little, for God's sakes.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Er, no, sorry, I know you don't like being called that... um, you want some bread?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: No, thank you.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: What are you reading there?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: It's just... an old Taran poetry collection.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Oh, oh, it's in Taran... I never knew much Taran, see. Even less so when it's written, I suppose, haha.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: If you want to sit down here, I won't mind.
attributes.name: Reed
Fionn
attributes.content: Alright, er...

attributes.name: Fionn
attributes.content: Actually, I've been meaning to thank you for last night.
attributes.joined: Alright, er... Actually, I've been meaning to thank you for last night.

attributes.content: All I did was give you some medicine.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: They're things I ought to do, cleaning wounds, bandaging. But Iâ€”still can't do them that well.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: That's fine, I didn't even dare touch the wound myself. Scared the living daylights.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: What I wanted to say was, if you hadn't set that fire off, we might never have escaped.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Fire...?
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: No, the fire wasn't me. I was just passing by.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Okay. If you say so, then it must've been a coincidence.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Ah, Dublinn my arse. Those army lot'll call anyone who disobeys them Dublinn. We're a lost cause, but good people like you, you shouldn't have to bear such heavy guilt.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Do you hate Dublinn, very much?
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I... I couldn't say.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: I'll give you a word of warning, seeing as you're from the city. For the past while, Dublinn's people have been around these parts.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: I hear they ran into one lot of Victoria's army, and not a single of those Victorians survived.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: That upset the lords of the city fierce, so they transferred in a whole thing of soldiers to Trent, seizing people all over the ScÃ¡thanna Fields. Burnt several villages down too.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: You really shouldn't have saved us, truth be told. We're not worth it.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: If I don'tâ€”care for other people's lives, then I won't have achievedâ€”what I agreed with Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Eh? Sorry, you're talking a little too quiet, actually...
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: No, it's nothing... I'm already aware ofâ€”some of what you've told me. I'll be careful on the way.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Er, you're going now?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Mm. It's day now. I won't need you to show me the way.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I understand. Tarans like your sort, speaking Victorian so finely, I know you don't like to talk with us much.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Hey, you seen Caireann? Woman about this tall, tail swings all around when she walks.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: No? Could you look for her around these parts, then, doctor? She hasn't come back since last night.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: Selmon, what's got you soâ€”
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Ah, Fionn, come on here and help us out.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: Oh, we've got signal here? Doesn't that mean we went the wrong direction again?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Looks like it. The comms facilities around here haven't been destroyed, which indicates they haven't advanced upon these parts.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Hmm... any word from Rhodes Island, then?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Basically the same as what the news says. Arson committed by a small group of Dublinn soldiers in Redridge village last night, burning down a building in the barracks.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: But said soldiers don't seem to have fled into these barrens.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The rest is all invalid info. It just so happens every nomadic city been far from these barrens for the past month. Our field operators haven't reported anything unusual.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: While we've only seen what mark the battles have left behind... and we can't even determine the scale of those battles from it.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: We can only tell one thing. There was a massive disparity between the two sides' power. It seems they made short work of that whole unit of Victorian soldiers.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Bagpipe, are you listening?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Your parts are installed in the wrong orientations. I can tell you're getting distracted again.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Wow, Chenchen, I didn't know you knew piledriver spear assembly too! It took me forever studyin' to actually remember how you maintain one.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I never fully got my head around the assembly.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I was just thinkin', why does Hughes always sound like somebody else in his letters? I know it doesn't make much sense bringin' it up, but...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That's fine. I've always trusted your intuition to be on the mark.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You feel like there's always something he wants to say, but doesn't dare to?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Just like how last time we went to see him, it was like he was being watched.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Aye, that's exactly it!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That proves we're not on the wrong track. The intel Hughes gave us was accurateâ€”enough so to put the enemy on guard.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The army can hide their march route, but there's some leaked hint of how raw materials are flowing for war purposes. Over the past few months, the few Dublinn units we've marked have all converged on this area.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The outer parts of Trent? This... uninhabited zone?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Chenchen, you look like you've seen a...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Three o'clock.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Same dress as back in County Hillock... it's the spectre force!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Come on, after themâ€”
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Wait, Bagpipe... there's something very strange about them.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Oh. They're just a few of them. It's like they're standin' guard... Are they bait?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No, not necessarily. They're reminding me of... some things that happened in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Don't underestimate them. We'll approach carefully.
attributes.name: Ch
